p: The lipophilic extracts ( Figure 1) of black morel ( M. importuna) were light yellowish oil with a yield of 0.148% ( w/ w, wet weight) for fresh sample, yellowish oil with a yield of 0.11% ( w/ w, dry weight) for the oven-dried sample and a yield of 0.132% ( w/ w, dry weight) for the freeze-dried sample.
